instructions:
Spoon 1/2 cup apple pie filling into 4 bowls or glass dessert dishes.
Top each with 1/2 cup chopped Keebler(R) Graham Cookies and 1/2 cup whipped topping.
Decorate with additional halved Keebler(R) Deluxe Graham Cookies.
ingredients: 2 cups Keebler® Fudge Shoppe® Deluxe Graham Cookies, chopped
4 Keebler® Fudge Shoppe® Deluxe Graham Cookies, halved
title: Quick Apple Crumble
